import { useParams, useHistory, NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import popularVerb from "./popularVerb"; import irregularVerb from "./irregularVerb" import irregularData from "./irregularAndPopularVerb"; import axios from "axios" import seulverb from "./data1" import Helmet from "react-helmet" import dotenv from "dotenv" dotenv.config() function SingleVerb() { /* const [AllData, setAllData] = useState(seulverb[0]) const [IsData, setIsData] = useState(false) */ const [inputValue, setinputValue] = useState("") const { singleVerb } = useParams() const history = useHistory() const verbSingleOne = singleVerb.split("-")[2].split(".")[0] const title = `Conjugation ${verbSingleOne} | Conjugate verb ${verbSingleOne} | Simplecyto Conjugator English`; const description = `Conjugate the English verb ${verbSingleOne}: indicative, past tense, participle, present perfect, passive, conditional, conjugation models and irregular verbs. Translate ride in context, with examples of use and prononciation.`; const filterData = irregularData.filter(element => element.conjugated_forms[0][1].split(" ")[1] === verbSingleOne) const verbObject = filterData[0] console.log("ttt", verbObject) console.log(verbObject.conjugation_tables.indicative[0]) /* useEffect(() => { const options = { method: 'GET', url: 'https://linguatools-conjugations.p.rapidapi.com/conjugate/', params: { verb: verbSingleOne }, headers: { 'x-rapidapi-key': "2a50965eebmsh629d096fce14516p1319aejsn22e0ba714d98", 'x-rapidapi-host': 'linguatools-conjugations.p.rapidapi.com' } }; axios.request(options).then(function (response) { if (response.data.result === `Wort ${verbSingleOne} nicht im Lexikon.`) { setAllData(seulverb[0]) setIsData(true) } else { setAllData(response.data) setIsData(false) } }).catch(function (error) { console.error(error); }); }, [verbSingleOne]) */ function seachVerb(e) { e.preventDefault() history.push(`/conjugation/conjugation-verb-${inputValue}.html`) } return (
{title}
{ setinputValue(e.target.value) }} />
{ (!irregularVerb.includes(verbSingleOne)) ? <>

Infinitive: to {verbSingleOne}

{ (verbSingleOne.split("").reverse()[0] === "y") ? (<>

Simple Past: {" " + verbSingleOne.split("").reverse().slice(1).reverse().join("") + "ied"}

Past Participle : {" " + verbSingleOne.split("").reverse().slice(1).reverse().join("") + "ied"}

) : (verbSingleOne.split("").reverse()[0] === "e") ? (<>

) : (<>

) }

  • I {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("I " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • You {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("you " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • He/She/It { verbSingleOne.split("").reverse()[0] === "h" || verbSingleOne.split("").reverse()[0] === "s" ? verbSingleOne + "es" : verbSingleOne.split("").reverse()[0] === "y" ? verbSingleOne.split("").reverse().slice(1).reverse().join("") + "ies" : verbSingleOne + "s" } { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("she " + verbSingleOne + "s") utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • We {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("we " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • You {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("you" + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • They {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("they " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
: (irregularVerb.includes(verbSingleOne)) ?
